feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the admin article submission fix to specific frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, styling approach, and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, border, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'AP Insight News' that mounts the React app at the #root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router with a root layout (Header/Footer) and routes for home, political, movies, article detail, admin, and admin reviews pages.
frontend/src/components/ArticleCard.tsx: Renders news articles in four visual variants (featured, newspaper, default, compact) with category badges, placeholder images, and formatted metadata.

frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand logo, quick links, category links, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution badge.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the sticky site header with a breaking news ticker, logo, date display, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/TopStoriesSideba: Displays a sidebar listing the top 5 news articles with numbered rank, title, and publication date, each linking to the article page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations including fetching, adding, and deleting news articles and reviews.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, defines CSS custom properties for the news-themed design system (colors, typography), and declares reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that bootstraps the React app with React Query, Internet Identity, and the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin page for managing news articles, providing a form to add articles and controls to delete or purge expired ones, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewsPage.tsx: Admin page that lists all user reviews with metadata and provides per-review delete functionality via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Detail page for a single news article showing full content, expiry status, related articles, and an authenticated review submission form with star ratings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page displaying a hero article, secondary stories, and categorized sections for political and movie news with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/MovieNewsPage.tsx: Paginated list page for movie-category news articles with a sidebar of top stories and a load-more button.
frontend/src/pages/PoliticalNewsPage.tsx: React page component that fetches and displays political news articles using a paginated list with a sidebar, loading skeletons, and error/empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (using oklch variables), fonts, border radii, shadows, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the app's current version, existing features, and a pending fix request (AR-1) for a broken article submission flow on the Admin page.
